price: 7. A Yallih inkittinaaney Mucammmad nee kah seecah yani ellecabö diinil maabbino (Nabii Qiisâ diini kinnuk), usuk kah seecam tu-hinna diraabay ginnaasite akke waytek iyyen.
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
